update `CBPD` set CBPD02 = #{cbpd02,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPD03 = #{cbpd03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPD04 = #{cbpd04,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPD05 = #{cbpd05,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPD06 = #{cbpd06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPD07 = #{cbpd07,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPD08 = #{cbpd08,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPD09 = #{cbpd09,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBPD10 = #{cbpd10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBPD11 = #{cbpd11,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBPD12 = #{cbpd12,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBPD13 = #{cbpd13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBPC01 = #{cbpc01,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBPD01 = #{cbpd01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.CBPC01,a.CBPC07,a.CBPC08,a.CBPC11, b.CBSA08, c.CBWA09, d.CALA08 from CBPC a LEFT JOIN CBSA b on a.CBPC09=b.CBSA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA c ON a.CBPC10=c.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA d on a.CBPC16=d.CALA01 WHERE a.CBPC06=0 and a.CBPC11 like concat('%', #{cbpc11}, '%') and a.CBPC01 like concat('%', #{cbpc01}, '%') and a.CBPC07 like concat('%', #{cbpc07}, '%') and a.CBPC09 like concat('%', #{cbpc09}, '%') and a.CBPC10 like concat('%', #{cbpc10}, '%') and c.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{cbwa09}, '%') and b.CBSA08 like concat('%', #{cbsa08}, '%')
and date_format(a.CBPC08,'%y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y-%m-%d')
and date_format(a.CBPC08,'%y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y-%m-%d')
and a.CBPC08 >= #{startTime} and a.CBPC08 <=#{endTime} order by a.CBPC02 desc
mapper.sql: select CBPC01, CBPC02, CBPC03, CBPC04, CBPC05, CBPC06, CBPC07, CBPC08, CBPC09, CBPC10, CBPC11, CBPC12, CBPC13, CBPC14, CBPC15, CBPC16, CBPC17, user_id from CBPC
mapper.insert:
insert into CBPC
CBPC02, CBPC03, CBPC04, CBPC05, CBPC06, CBPC07, CBPC08, CBPC09, CBPC10, CBPC11, CBPC12, CBPC13, CBPC14, CBPC15, CBPC16, CBPC17, user_id,
#{cbpc02}, #{cbpc03}, #{cbpc04}, #{cbpc05}, #{cbpc06}, #{cbpc07}, #{cbpc08}, #{cbpc09}, #{cbpc10}, #{cbpc11}, #{cbpc12}, #{cbpc13}, #{cbpc14}, #{cbpc15}, #{cbpc16}, #{cbpc17}, #{userId},
mapper.select: SELECT a.CBPC01,a.CBPC07,a.CBPC08,a.CBPC11,a.CBPC16, b.CBSA08, c.CBWA09, d.CALA08 from CBPC a LEFT JOIN CBSA b on a.CBPC09=b.CBSA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA c ON a.CBPC10=c.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA d on a.CBPC16=d.CALA01 WHERE a.CBPC06=0 order by a.CBPC08 desc

SELECT a.CBPC07,a.CBPC08,a.CBPC09,a.CBPC10, h.CALA08,e.CBSA08,g.CBWA09, f.CALA08 as cala08s,f.CALA01, d.CBPB12,d.CBPB08,d.CBPB15,b.CBPD01,a.CBPC01,
b.CBPD08, b.CBPD09,
b.CBPD11, b.CBPD12, b.CBPD13, p.CBPA07, c.CBPE09,c.CBPE10,l.CBLA09,c.CBPE03
from CBPC a LEFT JOIN CBPD b on a.CBPC01=b.CBPC01 LEFT JOIN CBPE c ON a.CBPC01=c.CBPC01 LEFT JOIN CBPB d on d.CBPB01=b.CBPD08 LEFT JOIN CBSA e on e.CBSA01=a.CBPC09 LEFT JOIN CALA f on f.CALA01=a.CBPC16
LEFT JOIN CALA h on h.CALA01=d.CBPB10
LEFT JOIN CBWA g on g.CBWA01=a.CBPC10
LEFT JOIN CBPA p on p.CBPA01=d.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CBLA l ON l.CBLA01=c.CBPE10
WHERE a.CBPC06=0 and a.CBPC01 = #{cbpc01} and g.CBWA09 = #{cbwa09}
and date_format(a.CBPC08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBPC08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
group by b.CBPD08

SELECT CONCAT_WS ('-', b.CALA08, a.CBPB12,a.CBPB08) from CBPB a LEFT JOIN CALA b ON a.CBPB10=b.CALA01 WHERE a.CBPB06=0 and b.CALA08 like concat('%', #{cala08}, '%') or a.cbpb12 like concat('%', #{cbpb12}, '%') or a.cbpb08 like concat('%', #{cbpb08}, '%')
